text: Márton Erdős was a wrestler from Hungary. Erdős competed at the 1968 Summer Olympics. He was born on 17 September 1944 and died on 25 November 2020.Márton Erdős == References == Category:1944 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Hungarian wrestlers Category:Olympians for Hungary Category:Sportspeople from Budapest
title: Márton Erdős
